Package com.mygdx.game.Core.Customers

Class Customer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mygdx.game.Core.Scriptable
      • com.mygdx.game.Core.PathFinder.PathfindingAgent
        • com.mygdx.game.Core.Customers.Customer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Person
    public class Customer
extends PathfindingAgent
implements Person
    Assigns all attributes and animation and interactions that the customer will go through in the game including which dish they will pick. Mixture of BlackCatStudios and Team Triple 10s
    Author:
    Felix Seanor, Jack Vickers, Amy Cross, Robin Graham

    • Constructor Detail

      • Customer

        public Customer​(int customerNumber,
                ItemEnum Order,
                com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureAtlas texture)
        Initialises the customer and certain variables that we are going to use to interact with the game. We also set the spawn randomiser and the interval between when each customer arrives Mixture of BlackCatStudios and Team Triple 10s
        Parameters:
        customerNumber - the ID of each individual customer which will be interacted with
        Order - the order
        texture - the texture
